charinfo.name: Cursed Seal Juugo (S)
charinfo.description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) is fully transformed and no longer recognizable. Becoming a psychotic lunatic Juugo is able to maintain absurd amounts of chakra making him nearly impossible to defeat.

abilities.name: Psychotic Break
abilities.description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) is out of his mind and targets 1 enemy. For 3 turns that enemy will be dealt 10 damage and Juugo will gain 20% damage reduction during this skill.

abilities.name: Chakra Cannons
abilities.description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) targets 1 enemy and deals 50 damage.

abilities.name: Body Absorption
abilities.description: Using Body Absorption Juugo Steals 15 health from 1 enemy.

abilities.name: Resilience
abilities.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Juugo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
